Trade/Device Name(s): BD FACSTM Sample Prep Assistant III
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): BD FACSCanto II flow cytometry system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD FACSTM Sample Prep Assistant III, an automated accessory for preparing whole blood samples for flow cytometry on BD FACSCanto II systems.
Indications for Use Summary: Automates pipetting of blood, reagents, and lysing solution for previously cleared flow cytometry assays on BD FACSCanto II systems for in vitro diagnostic use.
